CustomField.description: This field is used to record when a household should be visible to CATS, the external compliance team, until. If populated, it triggers sharing of the household via a sharing rule. Used as planners need to share households but do not have access to manual sharing as they do not own the accounts to be shared.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: If populated, CATS have access to this household and its snapshots. To remove access, clear this field. If the date is in the past, CATS still have access.
CustomField.label: Share with CATS until
